## Data Preprocessing

Creating an address column
```{r}
df1 <- df %>%
  filter(str_detect(Found_Location, "\\sin\\s")) %>%
  mutate(address = str_replace(Found_Location, "\\sin\\s", ", ")) %>%
  mutate(address = str_replace(address, "\\s\\(", ", ")) %>% 
  mutate(address = str_remove(address, "\\)"))
```
